00111111111111111111111111111111 00110011100000000000000000000000 // 1.111...1 * 2^0 + 1.0 * 2^-24 - 6 clock cycles due to denormalisation on round

01111111011111111111111111111111 01111111011111111111111111111111 // 1.111...1 * 2^127 + 1.111...1 * 2^127 - overflow
00000000100000000000000000000010 10000000100000000000000000000001 // denormal notation nos.
00010111111111111100000000111000 00000000000000000000000000000000 // zero
01111111100000000000000000000000 01100101010010000000000011111111 // inf
01111111111111111111111111111000 01101010101001000000001111110011 // NaN
01111111111111111111111111111100 11111111100000000000000000000000 // NaN + -inf
11111111100000000000000000000000 11111111111111111111111111111111 // -inf + NaN
10111111111111111111111111111111 00111111111111111111111111111111 // zero answer
11111111100000000000000000000000 01100101010010000000000011111111 // -inf
11111111100000000000000000000000 11111111100000000000000000000000 // -inf -inf
01111111100000000000000000000000 01111111100000000000000000000000 // inf + inf
11111111100000000000000000000000 01111111100000000000000000000000 // -inf + inf
10111111100000000000000000000000 00111111000000000000000000000000 // -1.0 + 0.5
00111111100000000000000000000000 10111111000000000000000000000000 // 1.0 - 0.5
10111111100000000000000000000000 10111111000000000000000000000000 // -1.0 -0.5
00111111100000000000000000000000 00111111000000000000000000000000 // 1.0 + 0.5
00000000000000000000000000000000 00000000000000000000000000000000 // 0.0 + 0.0
10000000000000000000000000000000 00111111100000000000000000000000 // -0.0 + 1.0
10000000000000000000000000000000 10000000000000000000000000000000 // -0.0 -0.0
01000010011100000000000000000000 01000000011100000000000000000000 // 1.111 * 2^5 + 1.111 * 2^1
01000010011100000000000000000000 11000000011100000000000000000000 // 1.111 * 2^5 - 1.111 * 2^1
11000010011100000000000000000000 01000000011100000000000000000000 // - 1.111 * 2^5 + 1.111 * 2^1
11000010011100000000000000000000 11000000011100000000000000000000 // - 1.111 * 2^5 - 1.111 * 2^1
01111111011111111111111111111111 01110010100000000000000000000000 // 1.111...1 * 2^127 + 1.0 * 2^102 - no overflow
01111111011111111111111111111111 01110011000000000000000000000000 // 1.111...1 * 2^127 + 1.0 * 2^103 - overflow after 5 cycles: due to round up
00000000000000000000000000000010 10000000000000000000000000000010 // zero answer for denormal rep
00000000000000000000000000000010 10000000000000000000000000000001 // denormal arithmetic
00000000000000000000000000000010 00000000000000000000000000000001 // denormal arithmetic
00000000010000000000000000000000 00000000011000000000100000000001 // sum of denormal giving normal number
